content: when using 64 stitches for a smaller sized hat the decrease rounds at the top of the hat will need to be adjusted round 43 k6 k2tog - repeat 7 more times skip the first decrease round and begin with the second decrease round - that is do not do the k15 k2tog round 44 k around 56 stitches round start with the k6 k2tog round and then follow pattern as written to finish the hat round 45 k5 k2tog - repeat 7 more times when creating a smaller hat you may need to adjust sizing further for a better or more personalized fit an easy round 46 k around 48 stitches adjustment is to keep the 4 purl rounds where indicated instead of bringing them down to 3 rounds as described round 47 k4 k2tog - repeat 7 more times round 48 k around 40 stitches above if more height to the hat is required if you are an experienced knitter you can make your own adjustments round 49 k3 k2tog - repeat 7 more times for other sizes or for a better fit using tips provided here as a guide round 50 k around 32 stitches this hat looks great with or without a pom pom so feel free to keep it as is or add a fluffy faux fur pom to finish the hat off finishing hat cut yarn leaving a long yarn tail for weaving enjoy your knitted cc style boulder beanie using a blunt yarn needle draw yarn through all remaining stitches and then after needles hashtag your finished hat #ccboulderbeanie and tag @inslstitches on instagram i d love to see your finished are removed pull yarn tail tightly to close the work top of the hat ensure top closure is secure by if you have any questions regarding this pattern you can email me at inslstitches@gmail com bringing yarn through to the inside of the hat turn hat inside out and continue to weave yarn through drawn stitches and pulling yarn tightly please note - you can sell the hats you make from this pattern but please credit my shop in stitches by using to ensure the hat has a secured closure fasten @inslstitches on instagram and facebook or reference the inslstitches shop on ravelry or etsy off weave in any remaining yarn ends ***do not alter rewrite redistribute or sell this pattern in any capacity this pattern was created for personal use with the only exception being the selling of items you make from it your cooperation is much appreciated - thank you ***
